text: Phwk khea khux brrda phu ptiseth sraththa læa pid kan phwk cea hı han hang ca kmasyidxal ha rxm læa kar cheuxd satw phli thi thuk kakkan wi mi hı brrlu su thi cheuxd khxng man læa hak michı pheraa mi brrda phu sraththa chay læa brrda phu sraththa hying sung phwk cea miru cak phwk khea phwk cea k ca kha phwk khea læw k ca kx hı keid thosʹ kæ phwk cea pheraa phwk khea doy miru taw thang ni pheux xallxhˌ ca thrng hı phu thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh khea xyu nı khwam metta khxng phraxngkh hak phwk khea yæk xxk cak kan nænxn rea k ca lngthosʹ brrda phu ptiseth sraththa nı hmu phwk khea sung kar lngthosʹ xan cebpwd
